title: I Would Rather Kill You
overview: The older sister Seon-yeong and the younger sister Ji-yeong, who left the busy city and moved to a remote rural village. The youth president Dae-geun and the village head Bong-sam, who work tirelessly day and night for the village's happiness and prosperity, fall for the two sisters who add excitement to the quiet village. Not only them, but also a suspicious man who is obsessed with them and a wanted criminal who makes a fuss in the village! This man, that man, all the men in the village are caught in the crazy trap of desire. In the end, unimaginable things happen in the house of the two sisters who have fallen into the trap...
